titleStmt.title: [T]he Maidens frollick: or, [A brief] relation how six lusty lasses has prest full fourteen taylors on the backside of St. Clements, and other adjacent places. [T]o the tune of an Orange.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: cropped with some loss of print; missing letters and words in ms. on item.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
